Title: Associated Building Contractor Framework 1 [Building (General), Building (D&B) & Roofing]
Description: Stockport Council are looking to establish a framework of contractors that provide a quality service, whilst also providing best value to S.M.B.C. in delivering their Capital Programme for Building (General), Building (Design & Build) & Roofing projects.
